title: Data Types
message:
Number: Numeric data
String: Character data
Boolean: true or false
NaN: Not a Number
undefined: no-value, incept, uninitialized
null: no value, nullified by a programmer

All those values are simple because they do not hold, collect, or aggregate other values they will return new simple values and do not alter the original value

Objects, Arrays, and Functions are complex data types because they aggregate other values making them indefinite in size
They are also passed by reference
